event_id.description: Identifier of the event to update.

start.description: New start time in ISO-8601 format.

end.description: New end time in ISO-8601 format.

timezone.description: Timezone to apply when start or end is provided.

oneOf.description: Updated attendee list; empty array clears attendees.

attendees.description: New attendee email address or list; limited to 500 unique entries.

updates.description: Dictionary of fields to update. Allowed keys: subject, start, end, timezone, location, body, attendees.

account_id.description: Microsoft account ID associated with the calendar.
